content.prompt: Democratic Party support by a new coalition of workers and African Americans during the 1930s was most similar to that of

choices.label: Whig Party support following the Mexican-American War
Republican Party support following the Civil War
Populist Party support following the Spanish-American War
Socialist Party support following the First World War

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
